long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--- FEATURES ---
- Counter on the side of your screen to show how much time you've spent on a site for a day.
- Page to see the sites you've visited that month, and how long you've visited them for.
- Fun, sometimes very ominous notifications when the extension thinks you might have been spending a little too long on a website...

--- PRIVACY ---
https://github.com/jtpotato/unstrand/blob/main/PRIVACY.md
Nothing leaves your device. Open-source if you want to see for yourself.

--- SOURCE CODE ---
